pkgmetadata.longdescription: hsparql includes a DSL to easily create queries, as well as methods to submit those queries to a SPARQL server, returning the results as simple Haskell data structures. Supports SELECT, CONSTRUCT, ASK and UPDATE queries. Example queries are included in the tests: <https://github.com/robstewart57/hsparql/blob/master/tests/DBPedia.hs>.
